p: Statistical analysis was performed using Prism (GraphPad software) version 6. Data are presented as the mean ± SEM. As indicated in the figure legends, Student t test, one-way ANOVA followed by Tukey’s post hoc or a two-way ANOVA followed by Bonferroni’s post hoc test was used to determine statistical significance between groups. P values <0.05 were considered statistically significant for all tests. *P < 0.05; **P < 0.01; ***P < 0.001.
